subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Tim Duncan, who led the Spurs to titles in 1999, 2003 and 2005, was at his casually dominant best, with an effortless 21 points in 28 minutes. Tony Parker added 21 points.
snippet: Tim Duncan, who led the Spurs to titles in 1999, 2003 and 2005, was at his casually dominant best, with an effortless 21 points in 28 minutes. Tony Parker added 21 points.
